New Records: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 off 53 balls
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli was close to tears as he was swamped by his teammates after the match
Dinesh Karthik was stumped by Mohammad Rizwan off Mohammad Nawaz
India won the match by four wickets
Ravichandran Ashwin completed the winning run and celebrated with a victory aeroplane style
Kohli and Hardik Pandya built a crucial partnership to guide India to the win
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a close game between India and Pakistan
Captain Babar Azam emphasized Pakistan's focus on improving their powerplay performance
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said he had no words for his innings and felt it was a special moment
Rohit Sharma praised Kohli's innings and said it was the best he has played for India
Babar Azam said Pakistan had started bowling well but India built a good partnership
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match had a thrilling finale with Kohli hitting an unbeaten 82 off 53 balls
Pakistan's decision to leave Mohammad Nawaz's final over of spin until the last will be one that will haunt Babar Azam
India's win was celebrated by their fans in the MCG with volcanic joy
Others: The match was played at the MCG on 23 October 2022
Kohli said he struggled in the past few months but the fans kept backing him
